Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientConnection  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameHandler
    This class handles a single match, instantiating a game mode (Game class) and a main controller (Controller class).
    Server
    This class is the main one of the server side.
    SocketClientConnection
    An instance of this class is created from SocketServer when it accepts a new connection.
    SocketServer
    Creates a socket that accept connections from clients, and creates a thread containing them.
    VirtualClient
    Virtual client interface; this is a representation of the virtual instance of the client, which is connected through server socket.
